main.name: Name
main.unleashing_future_online_interaction: We create a space where connection is deeper and collaboration is more productive.
main.unleashing_future_online_interaction_des: At a time when digital technology is permeating every aspect of life, it is important to recognize the importance of strengthening connections in the Meta-Universe - a shared space that connects people, ideas and information digitally.
main.meta_vision_description: How Meta Platforms help strengthen connections between people and find like-minded people in the digital space.
main.meta_identification_description: How Meta Platforms support the formation and development of digital communities around different interests, causes or identities.
main.meta_communication_description: How digital tools and functionality of Meta platforms promote collaboration between people and organizations
main.meta_world_experience_description: How strengthening connections in the Meta-Universe influences the formation of new cultural trends, stereotypes and social norms, as well as the spheres of economics, politics and education.
main.hybrid_vision_description: Seamlessly combining online publishing with Telegram mailing for a novel digital experience.
main.swift_identification_description: Quickly identify and connect with other users on the Telegram network through our Pax platform.
main.advanced_communication_description: Enhance your Telegram communications with features for efficient indexing and information sharing.
main.3d_world_experience_description: Immerse yourself in a new dimension of creativity, where you can interact with familiar activities in a unique format.
main.navigating_your_digital_universe: Navigating through the PaxInTrade digital universe
main.navigating_your_digital_universe_descrip: Your journey through the digital universe of PaxInTrade begins with a unique combination of platform services that will help you unlock its full potential. Our goal is to provide you with the utmost convenience and productivity in your online presence.
main.efficient_discovery_description: Utilize our advanced search engine for quick and efficient information discovery. Highlight your content and create a personalized space within our diverse platform.
main.private_asks_description: Easily identify and connect with others on the Telegram network for seamless sharing.
main.smart_filters_for_tailored_content_descr: Use our advanced filters to tailor your content consumption, ensuring a personalized and relevant digital experience.
main.positive_experience_from_early_users_des: Discover the experiences of PaxinTrade users who have found value and innovation in our platform.
main.what_is_paxintrade_description: Online portal that provides opportunities to search and share information within our dynamic network in interaction with the network of Telegram users. Our site combines the functionality of searching for user posts from Telegram and allows each such user to highlight their own content stream, creating a personalized web resource within our broad platform.
main.combination_of_services_in_one_platform: Combination of Services in One Platform
main.combination_of_services_in_one_platform_: We present ourselves as a unique combination of popular services such as Instagram, LinkedIn, Zoom, WhatsApp and Facebook Marketplace.
main.instagram_description: Connect with Reflect with dozens of applications without code
main.linkedin_description: Sync your reading highlights and notes with Reflect.
main.whatsapp_and_facebook_description: Save web clips and sync with your apps
main.unlock_new_dimension_of_connectivity: Unlock the New Dimension of Connectivity
main.unlock_new_dimension_of_connectivity_des: Ready to experience the next generation of online interaction? Join PaxinTrade now and embark on a journey where seamless communication, personalized content, and a 3D world await you. Create your account and redefine your digital presence today.
main.pax_footer_description: —Åhoice and freedom in every interaction, palce where worlds meet!
main.search_engine_description: With our unique search engine, you can easily find the information you are interested in by viewing posts and publications from other users.
main.verified_history_description: Given the rapid spread of fake news and misinformation online, we are creating a trusted space where each profile has a verified history of activity.
main.advanced_filters_description: With advanced filters and an intuitive interface, you can quickly find content that matches your interests.
main.verified_accounts_description: We place great importance on verifying user accounts over time. This ensures a high degree of authenticity and reliability of information distributed through our platform.
main.join_our_virtual_ecosystem: Join our virtual ecosystem where searching, sharing and interacting with information becomes more intelligent and satisfying. We pride ourselves on providing high quality content and the ability to create your own digital footprint in the online community world.
main.get_in_touch_description: Our friendly team would love to hear from you.
main.forgot_password_description: No worries, we will send you reset instructions.
main.accpet_terms_and_conditions_warning: Please accept the terms and conditions
main.welcome_back_sign_in: Welcome back! You've logged in successfully.
main.failed_create_account: Failed to create account. Please try again.

main.dashboard_publications_description: Publish posts and advertise in new ways! Your contacts directly through the telegram network

privacy.weCollect: We collect only the necessary personal information necessary to provide our social network services. Personal information may include name, email address, date of birth, photographs, contact information and other information voluntarily provided by the user.
privacy.weUse: We use the personal information provided only for purposes related to providing and improving our social network services. Personal information may be used to communicate with the user, provide a personalized experience, send information about news and updates, and resolve potential problems.
privacy.dataProtInfo: We make every effort to maintain the security of user information and protect it from unauthorized access, use or disclosure. We use industry standard security techniques to protect your data, but we cannot guarantee complete security of any data transmission over the Internet.
privacy.provideInfoDesc: We do not sell, rent or provide users' personal information to third parties without their express consent, except as required by law. We may provide anonymized and aggregated information to third parties to analyze and improve our social network.
privacy.cookieInfoDesc: We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about users' activities on our site. . The user can manage their cookie settings in their browser, however disabling cookies may affect the functionality of the site.
privacy.privacyChangeDesc: We may update our privacy policies from time to time and changes will be posted on this page. If the user continues to use our social network after changes are made, this means that he agrees with the new version of the privacy rules.
privacy.userConsDesc: The user agrees to the privacy rules by using our social network. If the user does not agree with the privacy rules, he must stop using our site.
privacy.contRulesDesc: If the user has questions or comments regarding the privacy rules, he can contact us at the specified contacts.

rules.ilegal: It is prohibited to post illegal information:
rules.ilegalDesc: The platform strictly prohibits the publication, distribution or sharing of information that violates laws, including, but not limited to, information related to violence, illegal activities, defamation, obscenity and copyright infringement.
rules.ilegalLang: The use of obscene language is prohibited:
rules.ilegalLangDesc: The platform promotes respectful and civil communication. Therefore, the use of obscene language, offensive language, threats, discriminatory or hate speech is prohibited.
rules.ilegalInfoDesc: The author of the posted information bears full responsibility for its content. The platform does not guarantee the truthfulness, accuracy or reliability of the information posted and is not responsible for any damage or consequences arising from the use of such information.
rules.platRespDesc: The platform is not responsible for the information posted by the platform authors. Users are the independent authors of their content and are responsible for its legality, reliability and compliance with the rules of the platform.
rules.accBlock: Blocking of the account in violation of the rules:
rules.accBlockDesc: In case of violation of any of the established posting rules, the platform reserves the right to block the user's account without prior notice. Account blocking can be temporary or permanent depending on the nature of the violation.
